short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create custom dynamic QR codes with your logo & design - by Hovercode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create custom QR codes without having to change your tab.

Just launch the extension, select a template and your QR code is ready. Optionally customise the design by adding your logo and adjusting colors.

⭐️ Static & Dynamic QR codes ⭐️
You can create static codes without signing in or creating an account.

If you want tracking and the ability to edit your scan destination, you can connect the extension to Hovercode and create dynamic QR codes. You can create 10 dynamic QR codes for free or upgrade for more. The free dynamic QR codes don't expire and don't include ads.

⭐️ Scan tracking & analytics ⭐️
With Dynamic QR codes, you can track how many times your QR codes are scanned, so you can compare how your campaigns perform

⭐️ Edit your scan destination after printing ⭐️
With dynamic QR codes, you can change the scan destination without having to reprint your QR code

⭐️ Powered by Hovercode ⭐️
This extension is powered by Hovercode, with is the trusted QR code generator for thousands of customers.
